strategy: Chaos Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Night Lords, using their preferred operational methods.

formations.name: Night Raptor Company
formations.units: One Night Lords Captain, six Raptors
extraUnits: Add up to two Raptors: 30 points each

sections.name: Night Lords Elite Formations
sections.description: Up to one Elite formation may be taken per Night Lords Core Formation

formations.name: Chosen
formations.units: Four Night Lords Chosen, two Chaos Rhinos
extraUnits: Replace two Chaos Rhinos with four Chaos Tarantulas: 25 points

formations.name: Terminator Company
formations.units: One Night Lords Captain, four Atramentar Terminators
extraUnits: Add two Chaos Spartan Assault Tanks: 150 points

sections.name: Night Lords Support Formations
sections.description: Up to two Support formations may be taken per Night Lords Core Formation.

formations.name: Terror Company
formations.units: One Night Lords Captain, four Night Lords Assault Marines, two Night Lords Dreadnoughts

formations.name: Support Company
formations.units: One Night Lords Captain, six Chaos Space Marines, three Chaos Rhinos
extraUnits: Replace three Chaos Rhinos with three Chaos Land Raiders: 125 points

formations.name: Attack Company
formations.units: One Night Lords Captain, six Chaos Attack Bikes

sections.name: Night Lords Static Defenses and Navy
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations. No more than one Tarantula formation for each Chosen formation.

sections.name: Daemon Pool
sections.description: Any amount may be spent on Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Lesser Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Lesser Daemon Pool points. Add one for each Daemonic Pact in the army.

upgrades.title: Night Lords Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

options.description: Replace the Night Lords Captain with a Night Lords First Captain
Replace the Night Lords Captain and its unit with a Night Lords Daemon Prince

items.name: Icon Bearer
items.description: Add an Icon Bearer to the formation

items.name: Dreadclaws
items.description: Transport a formation containing only infantry units and Dreadnoughts in Drop Pods (formation must be deployed on a spacecraft)

items.name: Dreadnoughts
items.description: Add up to two Night Lords Dreadnoughts
